channel.title: Need help with compiling p16 v.6 e8
channel.description:
dunno why this one wont compile it says java is not recognized.
i have been able to compile many other servers before p16 v.6 e8, but i cant figure this one out.

item.title: Need help with compiling p16 v.6 e8
item.dc:creator: @tuppatsch tuppatsch
item.description:
@tuppatsch wrote:

i know all that, ill show u whats in my compiler

@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAME Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause:

this should by all means work, it should compile then run the server.

but i get an error

error: cannot read *.java
1 error

maby its anti leech or something but its a p16 source and it said it was a SOURCE

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with compiling p16 v.6 e8

item.title: Need help with compiling p16 v.6 e8
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“tuppatsch, post:1, topic:28019”]dunno why this one wont compile it says java is not recognized.

i have been able to compile many other servers before p16 v.6 e8, but i cant figure this one out.[/quote]

Make sure that the code inside the compile looks like this:

@echo off
COLOR 04
title RS2 Private Server Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

MAKE SURE IT DOESN’T LOOK LIKE THIS:

@echo off
COLOR 04
title RS2 Private Server Compiler
java *.java
pause

This is a stupid thing Wolf and most other’s put in their compilers and it does not work unless you have the paths set up correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with compiling p16 v.6 e8
